name: Driftglider
description:
Left and right to steer.
Up to accelerate.
Down to restart level.
X to proceed to next level.
Hold Z and press X to cycle through levels.

In fullscreen mode, use ctrl-8 and ctrl-9 to save gifs, they can be copied from the backdrop once you exit fullscreen.
Hint: For better high scores, hold accelerate while you restart.
